title: Title
myLocationNotAuthorized: The acquisition of the geolocation information failed because the page did not have the permission to do it.
myLocationError: The acquisition of the geolocation failed because one or several internal sources of position returned an internal error.
myLocationTimeout: The time allowed to acquire the geolocation was reached before the information was obtained.
myLocationSelectOption: Select the 'View Location' option to enable viewing of your position.
heading: Direção
searchByCoordinateInfo: Click on the map to obtain the coordinates or enter their values ​​using the following form.
searchByCoordinateNotActive: Click on the button in the main menu to activate the tool and then click on the map to get the coordinates. You can also enter the coordinate values using the form.
identifyNoResults: No results. Click on the map to identify.
identifyNotActive: Click on the button in the main menu to activate the tool, then click on the map to identify elements.
measureInfoDistance:
1. to start measuring, click on the map at the initial location
2. to measure a route click on the intermediate locations
3. to finish, double-click
measureInfoArea:
1. to start measuring, click on the map at a starting location
2. continue clicking on the locations that define the area
3. to finish, double-click
measureMsgContinuePolygon: Click to continue drawing the polygon
measureMsgContinueLine: Click to continue drawing the line
deleteAllElments: Do you want to delete all elements?
locationMarkingMsg: You must mark the desired location on the map
selectPrintTypeMsg: Choose the type of printing you want.
selectFormatAndPrints: Select the format and prints and click Continue
finishPrinting: Finished prints. You can download the desired prints.
printMapScaleOptionMsg: Print based on the map  active scale
noPrintMsg: This viewer has no prints configured.
errorCreatingFile: An error occurred when generating the file
errorPrinting: An error occurred when generating the print
defaultRGPDmsg: This website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. By pressing 'I Accept' you are agreeing to its use.
confirmAction: Are you sure you want to continue?
noTocThemesMsg: There are no themes. Click on the + menu to add them.
saveSessionErrorMsg: It was not possible to record the session.
warnThemeExists: The theme has already been added to the map
warnThemeNotFound: Couldn't find theme in map themes list
allowAddThemes: Allow themes to be added to the map
name: Name
passwordResetRequestSuccessMsg: An email has been sent with instructions for recovering your password.
passwordResetRequestInfoMsg: If you do not receive the email with instructions for recovering your password within the next few minutes, check that it has not been sent to the SPAM area of ​​your email.
passwordLowerRule: At least a lower case letter
passwordUpperRule: At least an upper case letter
userRegistrationSuccessMsg: Your account was created with the {{username}} username, you must activate it within the next 24 hours. Please check the account activation instructions sent to {{email}}.
userRegistrationErrorAlreadyExists: A user with the specified username or email already exists
activeUserSession: There is an active session for the user {{username}}.
andFinishUserRegistration: and complete the user creation process
userRegistrationFillEmail: Enter the email used to create the user so that a new confirmation can be sent
userRegistrationConfirmationSentToEmail: User creation confirmation sent to email {{email}}.
userRegistrationConfirmationWrongEmail: There is no user with the email indicated.
